definitions.definition: Synonym of booty , goods seized from an enemy by violence , particularly ( historical ) during the sacking of a town in war or ( video games ) after successful combat .
examples: The loot from the sack of Constantinople included the head of John the Baptist .

definitions.definition: Synonym of sack , the plundering of a city , particularly during war .
examples: He consented to the loot of the city by the men under his command.

definitions.definition: ( colloquial , US ) Any valuable thing received for free , especially Christmas presents .

main_definition: Synonym of booty , goods seized from an enemy by violence , particularly ( historical ) during the sacking of a town in war or ( video games ) after successful combat .
secondary_definitions: Synonym of sack , the plundering of a city , particularly during war .
( colloquial , US ) Any valuable thing received for free , especially Christmas presents .

definitions.definition: ( UK dialectal , Northern England , Scotland ) A scoop used to remove scum from brine pans in saltworks .

main_definition: ( UK dialectal , Northern England , Scotland ) A scoop used to remove scum from brine pans in saltworks .
( US military slang , dated ) Clipping of lieutenant .
